enhanced_description: Authbridge is India’s largest authentication company, specializing in identity management, onboarding, and verification. It leverages AI-driven technologies such as facial recognition, liveness detection, data extraction, and optical character recognition (OCR) to verify national identity, educational, and professional documents. The platform automates mundane compliance and verification processes, utilizing a proprietary database alongside public databases for instant searches and real-time API verifications. Authbridge's solutions are designed to build a solid workforce and a verified customer base, eliminate risks of fraud, and conduct thorough due diligence for business partners and third-parties, ensuring data security compliance.
